metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12756 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Command inject in transfer from another server in extplorer 2.1.9 and priorallows attacker to inject command via the userfile[0] parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12756` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

extplorer - 2.1.0b6+dfsg.3-4+deb7u5ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: extplorer package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0b6+dfsg.3-4+deb7u5ubuntu0.16.04.1').
